title: ДНК
overview: On NTV - an acutely social talk show "DNA". The heroes of the program are ordinary families, for whom a DNA test is the only way to end bitter disputes between relatives.Thanks to the genetic examination, program guests have the opportunity to establish paternity and demand payment of alimony, confirm kinship and reunite with relatives, identify legal heirs and learn more about their ancestry. Any person who finds himself in a difficult life situation can become a hero of the program and take a DNA test for free.
